name: Lavender Goat Milk Soap
description: Handcrafted soap made with fresh goat milk and infused with lavender essential oils.

name: Rustic Honey Candle
description: A slow-burning beeswax candle with a natural honey scent, hand-poured in a mason jar.

name: Braided Leather Bracelet
description: Hand-braided leather bracelet with an adjustable clasp, available in brown or black.

name: Beeswax Food Wraps (3-Pack)
description: Eco-friendly and reusable food wraps made with cotton and local beeswax.

name: Hand-Knitted Wool Beanie
description: Cozy and breathable beanie made from 100% local wool, hand-knitted with love.

name: Herbal Healing Salve
description: Infused with calendula and comfrey, this salve soothes cuts, burns, and dry skin.

name: Cedarwood Beard Oil
description: A nourishing beard oil blend of jojoba, argan, and cedarwood essential oil.

name: Macrame Plant Hanger
description: Add charm to your indoor space with this hand-knotted macrame plant hanger.

name: Hand-Painted Ceramic Mug
description: Unique ceramic mug hand-painted with floral designs, microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: Raw Honey (16 oz)
description: Unfiltered and locally sourced raw honey from wildflower blooms.
